select
,case when tsds.history >0 then tsds.history else tsds.history*-1 end as history from t_stock_details tsds
tsds.stock_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
and tsds.stock_type like concat('%',#{stockType},'%')
and tsds.oper_type like concat('%',#{operType},'%')
and tsds.busi_no like concat('%',#{busiNo},'%')
and tsds.goods_id = #{goodsId}
order by tsds.timestamp desc

select tg.goods_id,tg.goods_name,tg.goods_no,tg.brand_name,tg.frt_cat_name,tg.scd_cat_name,tg.main_unit_id,tg.stock,tg.stockout from t_goods as tg
,t_goods_spec as tgs
where tg.deleted = 0
and tg.brand_name like concat('%',#{brandName},'%')
and instr(tg.combine,#{combine})
and tg.frt_cat_name = #{frtCatName}
and tg.scd_cat_name = #{scdCatName}
and tg.goods_id = tgs.goods_id and tgs.prop_name like concat('%',#{propName},'%')

select count(1) from t_goods as tg
,t_goods_spec as tgs
where tg.deleted = 0
and tg.brand_name like concat('%',#{brandName},'%')
and instr(tg.combine,#{combine})
and tg.frt_cat_name = #{frtCatName}
and tg.scd_cat_name = #{scdCatName}
and tg.goods_id = tgs.goods_id and tgs.prop_name like concat('%',#{propName},'%')

select ts.stock_id, ts.stock_no ,ts.stock_time ,ts.stat,ts.emp_id,ts.stock_remarks from t_stock ts ,t_stock_detail tsd where ts.stock_no = tsd.stock_no
and ts.stock_no = #{stockNo}

select
from t_stock ts where ts.stat = 1 and ts.busi_no = #{busiNo}

select
from t_stock ts where ts.stat = 1 and ts.stock_type = '出库单' and ts.busi_no = #{busiNo}

select
from t_stock ts where ts.stock_id = (select max(stock_id) from t_stock where stock_type = #{stockType})
select ts.stock_no from t_stock ts where ts.stock_id = (select max(stock_id) from t_stock where substring(stock_type,1,3) = #{stockType}) group by ts.stock_no
select from t_stock ts where stock_no = #{stockNo} for update
